name: pixie-plate
effect: Held: Fairy-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus's and Judgment's type to Fairy.
short_effect: Held: Fairy-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus's and Judgment's type to Fairy.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Fairy-type moves.
